body:
1. 移除OKHttpURLConnection库，不再支持对使用Android自带网络库的日志拦截；
> 从该版本开始，pandora和OkHttp具体版本无关；

2. 新增 `gradle-plugin` 插件，可将pandora-interceptor自动注入到所有OkHttp对象中；
> 在此之前需要手动调用`addInterceptor(Pandora.get().getInterceptor())`，并且无法对第三方库中的网络请求进行拦截；

---
1. Remove OKHttpURLConnection, No longer supports log interception for Android's own network library.
>  since 2.1.0, Pandora is independent of the specific version of OkHttp

2. Add `gradle-plugin` , it can inject pandora-interceptor into okhttp automatically.
> In the past, we need to manually invoke 'addInterceptor(pandora.get ().getinterceptor ())' , and can't intercept network requests in third-party libraries.

name: v2.0.5
body:
1. 修复多进程Pandora.get()为null的问题；
2. 为 “查看HTTPURLConnection请求” 增加开关；

--- 
1. Fixing issue in multi-process 
2. Adding filter for network emit source.

1. 适配最新的OKHttp（3.14.0），即从v2.0.3开始，你项目中的OKHttp的依赖至少为3.14.0；

---
1. Adapting to the latest OKHttp (3.14.0)，that means OKHttp in your project is at least 3.14.0 since v2.0.3

1. 查看HttpBody时增加搜索功能；
2. 增加对AndroidX的支持，具体版本号规则为：`androidx_版本号` ；
3. 修复 HttpBody 过大OOM 或引发的其它 bug；

---

1. Support search when view the http body.
2. Provide AndroidX version dependency, the rule is `androidx_RELEASE`.
3. Fixing OOM or other bug if http body is too large.

## 新特性

1. 网络日志新增对Android默认URLConnection的支持；
2. 新增Crash记录和查看的功能；
3. 新增Activity历史栈记录的功能；
4. 新增添加自定义快捷入口的功能，具体请查看 [Add shortcuts to Pandora](https://github.com/whataa/pandora#1-add-shortcuts-to-pandora)；
5. 新增部分功能的使用帮助；
6. 多语言自动切换的支持；

## 优化

0. 兼容支持Android 9.0：反射限制；
1. 增加网络日志对请求错误情况的支持；
2. 优化查看数据库列表的同步问题；
3. 优化操作文件的同步问题；
4. 优化选择视图的长按操作；
4. 新的面板样式；
5. 优化权限申请提示；
6. 代码优化，Demo更新；

## 其它

1. 移除废弃的API：`Pandora.get().getIntercepter().addJsonFormat()`
2. Gradle 版本更新；

----
# EN DOC

## new feature

1. Support inspecting Android-UrlConnection HTTP log.
2. Support for logging Crash logs.
3. Support for logging Activity lifeCycle logs.
4. Support for adding shortcuts to the panel, please check [Add shortcuts to Pandora](https://github.com/whataa/pandora#1-add-shortcuts-to-pandora)；
5. Add help doc for some feature.
6. Support for Locale. (en/zh)

## optimize

0. Bypass APIs access restrictions in Android P.
1. Recording and show the error messages if HTTP failed.
2. Keep the count of DB always up to date.
3. Keep the UI up to date when delete files.
4. Optimize the long press operation of the selection widget.
4. New panel style.
5. Optimize permission request prompts.
6. Code optimization, update demo；

## others

1. Remove the Deprecated API：`Pandora.get().getIntercepter().addJsonFormat()`
2. Upgrade Gradle version.

## new feature

1. add the ability to launch the specified activity

## optimization

1. change the way to load network results as webView

## new feature

1. Support custom json formatting to let http result look pretty
2. Support preview images for http

## optimization

1. Improve activity performance
2. Compatible with lower v4 / v7 versions
3. other bugs fix

1. Fixing 「can not get the attrs of some views, such as the dialog」 bug.
2. Fixing 「FLAG_ACTIVITY_NEW_TASK」 bug.

## new feature
1. 「show current activity」can show any current activity name.
2. 「grid line」can show a grid line for debug UI.
3. 「setting」can config some value like shaking threshold and so on.

## optimization
1. a new 「view hierarchy」for better display.
2. merge 「select」and 「position」, enhancing the ability to select views.
3. no need any code to init pandora.

name: fix bug
body: In the view hierarchy, id is not unique, such as the items of listView.

name: add request permission hint, add query-param for network
